name: Keen Senses
book: Advanced Player's Guide. Copyright 2010, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: The subject gains a +2 competence bonus on Perception checks and gains low-light vision. Subjects that have low-light vision double the distance they can see under the effects of this spell.
components_zh: 语言，材料/法器 (一根鹰的羽毛)
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 受术者的察觉检定获得+2表现加值，并且获得昏暗视觉。已经拥有昏暗视觉的生物在该法术的影响下会使可视距离加倍。 King's Castle
